mapper.select: SELECT op.PayPrice, op.TotalMoneyCount, op.ShoppingCount, p.*, p.Product_A productA FROM orderproduct op INNER JOIN product p ON (p.ProductId=op.ProductId) WHERE op.OrderId=#{orderid}
SELECT f.*, f.Favorites_A favoritesA, f.Favorites_B favoritesB, f.Favorites_C favoritesC FROM favorites f WHERE UserId=#{userid} AND ProductId=#{productid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorites WHERE UserId=#{userid} AND ProductId=#{productid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopcar (UserId, ProductId, orderamount, Price) VALUES (#{userid},#{productid},#{orderamount},#{price})
mapper.select: SELECT o.OrderId, p.*, op.PayPrice, op.ShoppingCount, op.TotalMoneyCount, c.Comment, c.UserId, c.CommentReview, c.CommentTime, c.GoodComment, c.CommentId FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN comment c ON c.Comment_C=o.OrderId INNER JOIN orderproduct op ON op.ProductId=c.ProductId INNER JOIN product p ON c.ProductId = p.ProductId WHERE o.OrderId=#{id} AND op.OrderId=o.OrderId ORDER BY c.Comment,c.CommentTime DESC
SELECT * FROM `order` o WHERE o.OrderId=#{orderid} AND o.Status=#{status}
SELECT * FROM `order` o WHERE o.OrderId=#{orderid} AND o.Order_A=#{liyou}
SELECT p.*, p.Product_A productA, p.Product_B productB, p.Product_C productC FROM product p WHERE p.ProductId=#{productid}
